name: Beaulieu
description:
Introduction

Approach

  • From parking Le Petit Sault near 48.81766,-66.75048, ~45min west uphill along the Sentier international des Appalaches

Descent

~20 obstacles including abseils (some guided), jumps (up to 12m) and slides

Exit

Red tape

Within Reserve faunique de Matane - access fees and restrictions may apply

Beta sites

  • http://www.eskamer.ca/fr/02_canyoning/02_canyoning.html
  • Icopro.org : Beaulieu

Trip reports and media
